org.cougaar.core.service
Interface AgentQuiescenceStateService

All Superinterfaces:
Service
public interface AgentQuiescenceStateService
extends Service

This service allows a component to query the agents registered with the node's QuiescenceReportService and mark agents as dead (ignorable) when they have been restarted on another node.

Method Summary
 java.lang.String getAgentQuiescenceBlockers(MessageAddress agentAddress)
          Show the QuiescenceService clients that are blocking quiescence for this agent, if any
 boolean isAgentAlive(MessageAddress agentAddress)
          Is the named agent alive for quiescence purposes, or has it been marked as dead to be ignored?
 boolean isAgentEnabled(MessageAddress agentAddress)
          Is the named agent's quiescence service enabled (ie the Distributor is fully loaded)?
 boolean isAgentQuiescent(MessageAddress agentAddress)
          Is the named agent quiescent?
 boolean isNodeQuiescent()
          Is the Node altogether quiescent
 MessageAddress[] listAgentsRegistered()
          List the local agents with quiescence states for the Node to consider
 void setAgentDead(MessageAddress agentAddress)
          Mark the named agent as dead - it has been restarted elsewhere, and should be ignored locally for quiescence calculations.

List the local agents with quiescence states for the Node to consider

isAgentEnabled

boolean isAgentEnabled(MessageAddress agentAddress)
Is the named agent's quiescence service enabled (ie the Distributor is fully loaded)?

Parameters:
agentAddress - The agent to query
Returns:
true if the agent's quiescence service has been enabled and it counts towards Node quiescence

Is the named agent quiescent?

Parameters:

Returns:

isAgentAlive

boolean isAgentAlive(MessageAddress agentAddress)
Is the named agent alive for quiescence purposes, or has it been marked as dead to be ignored?

Parameters:
agentAddress - The agent to query
Returns:
false if the agent is dead and should be ignored for local quiescence

void setAgentDead(MessageAddress agentAddress)
Mark the named agent as dead - it has been restarted elsewhere, and should be ignored locally for quiescence calculations.

Parameters:
agentAddress - The Agent to mark as dead
